subject: Re: Help! Stack trace truncated
msgSnippet: ... wrong. After looking through the JUnit source code, I m pretty sure it s not JUnit.  It may, however, be Ant s xml writer, but the same truncation happens
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> wrote:
> I believe JDK 1.4.1 is doing thing, and not JUnit or Ant. I maybe be
wrong.

After looking through the JUnit source code, I'm pretty sure it's not
JUnit. It may, however, be Ant's xml writer, but the same truncation
happens whether I use Ant's xml writer or the plain writer. I can't
find a setting for Ant that describes truncating output. JUnit's
limit is called maxmessage, but I have it set to -1 so that it won't
truncate.
